clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Selinexor is indicated for the treatment of relapsed or refractory multiple myeloma in combination with dexamethasone label Patients must have received at least 4 prior therapies and have disease which is refractory to least two proteasome inhibitors at least two immunomodulatory agents and an anti CD38 monoclonal antibody

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Selinexor causes cell cycle arrest and apoptosis in cancer cells label

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Darbepoetin alfa is combined with Selinexor
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Erythropoietin is combined with Selinexor
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Peginesatide is combined with Selinexor
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Methoxy polyethylene glycol epoetin beta is combined with Selinexor
The serum concentration of Selinexor can be decreased when it is combined with Pitolisant
The metabolism of Selinexor can be increased when combined with Metreleptin
The excretion of Pravastatin can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Valsartan can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Liothyronine can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Caspofungin can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Ouabain can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Cholic Acid can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Taurocholic acid can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Pitavastatin can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Cholecystokinin can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Gadoxetic acid can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Technetium Tc 99m mebrofenin can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Sincalide can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Glecaprevir can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Levosalbutamol can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Erythromycin can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Conjugated estrogens can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Raloxifene can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Methotrexate can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Testosterone can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Mycophenolate mofetil can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Rifampicin can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Atorvastatin can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Fluvastatin can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Paclitaxel can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Docetaxel can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Liotrix can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Cobimetinib can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Romidepsin can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Simeprevir can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Ambrisentan can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Paritaprevir can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Tenofovir alafenamide can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Selexipag can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Grazoprevir can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Voxilaprevir can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Letermovir can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Fexofenadine can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Bempedoic acid can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The excretion of Belantamab mafodotin can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
Selinexor may decrease the excretion rate of Revefenacin which could result in a higher serum level
The serum concentration of Selinexor can be decreased when it is combined with Cenobamate
The serum concentration of Selinexor can be increased when it is combined with Ritonavir
The serum concentration of Haloperidol can be increased when it is combined with Selinexor
The metabolism of Tucatinib can be decreased when combined with Selinexor
The serum concentration of Selinexor can be increased when it is combined with Abametapir
The serum concentration of Selinexor can be decreased when it is combined with Satralizumab
